title: BRIEF-Shopify ‍announces expanded integration with Instagram​
text: March 20, 2018 / 6:04 AM / in 44 minutes BRIEF-Shopify ‍announces expanded integration with Instagram​ Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Shopify Inc: * ‍ANNOUNCES ITS EXPANDED INTEGRATION WITH INSTAGRAM​ * ‍”SHOPPING ON INSTAGRAM” FEATURE THAT ALLOWS BUSINESSES TO TAG PRODUCTS IN POSTS IS NOW ENABLED FOR MERCHANTS IN EIGHT ADDITIONAL MARKETS​ * SHOPIFY- ‍SHOPPING ON INSTAGRAM IS NOW AVAILABLE TO MERCHANTS SELLING IN US, CANADA, UNITED KINGDOM, AUSTRALIA, GERMANY, FRANCE, ITALY, SPAIN AND BRAZIL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
